message:
SYSTEM: OWL.pdf: Página 13
Web Ontology Language
OWL semantics
OWL is “Axiom-centric”
Entities only “exist” as part of axioms, and therefore the only 
way of creating an entity in an ontology is by adding an 
axiom that refers to it. We cannot create the class A, but we 
can state that A subClassOf owl:Thing
!!!
speaker: SYSTEM
